title: Border, 1750–99
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: bobbin lace made in Lille style with heavy outlining thread
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of Lille-style lace with stylized floral sprays in a repeat pattern. Fond: fond simple. Modes: fond à cinq trous.
